self.name: messages.deleteChatUser
self.description: Deletes a user from a chat and sends a service message on it.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Deletes a user from a chat and sends a service message on it.

throws.description: You must be an admin in this chat to do this
throws.name: CHAT_ADMIN_REQUIRED

throws.description: The provided chat id is invalid
throws.name: CHAT_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The provided peer id is invalid
throws.name: PEER_ID_INVALID

throws.description: The provided user ID is invalid
throws.name: USER_ID_INVALID

throws.description: You're not a member of this supergroup/channel
throws.name: USER_NOT_PARTICIPANT
